Package server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
server.Server
public final class Server extends Object
Server-Class for getting access to the Collection file and working with it Should be accessed via Manager

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public String connect(String request)
      Method for establishing connection to Server Manager via request-response system
      Parameters:
      request - Command for server. Arguments are separated by " ".
      Returns:
      Server response, outcomes in 1 string. Using /n as end of Line and ; as delimiter for element params

    • readFile

      private void readFile() throws NullValueException
      Method for getting information from file. Name of the file is inputted via environment variable "CollectionPath"
      Throws:
      NullValueException - Creating new Vehicle may produce NullValueException

    • createInfo

      private void createInfo()
      Method creating information for new file

    • updateInfo

      private void updateInfo()
      Method for updating information whenever list size changes

    • listToString

      private String listToString()
      Method return String representation of Collection
      Returns:
      String produced from ArrayList

    • getFuelTypes

      private String getFuelTypes()
      Method for converting all the Fuel types to one string
      Returns:
      String of all the Fuel types delimited by /n

    • getVehicleTypes

      private String getVehicleTypes()
      Method for converting all the Vehicle types to one string
      Returns:
      String of all the Vehicle types delimited by /n

    • list_update

      private void list_update() throws NullValueException
      Method for updating id field in all the Collection elements
      Throws:
      NullValueException - Setting new id for vehicle may produce NullValueException

    • getMinimal

      private long getMinimal()
      Method for getting the minimal vehicle value in the Collection
      Returns:
      Minimal value of vehicle in the Collection
